data.text: @alexhelenc1970 Unfortunately, the vouchers cannot be used to book a BA Holidays package online. You would either need to call our Sales team and make the booking with them or book online then email your vouchers to baholidays@ba.com (travel must be completed by 30 Sep 23 to be valid). Steven.

Samantha W
